subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United beat title rival Chelsea, 3-1, for its fifth straight victory in the Premier League, and Manchester City squandered a two-goal lead in a 2-2 tie at Fulham.
snippet: Manchester United beat title rival Chelsea, 3-1, for its fifth straight victory in the Premier League, and Manchester City squandered a two-goal lead in a 2-2 tie at Fulham.
